mapper.sql: id, travel_num, user_num, user_name, gmt_go, gmt_back, trasportation_back, trasportation_go, cost_go, cost_back, cos_stay, booking_type_back, booking_type_go, stay_booking_type, stay_days
mapper.insert: insert into travel_user_t (id, travel_num, user_num, user_name, gmt_go, gmt_back, trasportation_back, trasportation_go, cost_go, cost_back, cos_stay, booking_type_back, booking_type_go, stay_booking_type, stay_days ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{travelNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtGo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtBack,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{trasportationBack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trasportationGo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costGo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{costBack,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cosStay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bookingTypeBack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookingTypeGo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stayBookingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stayDays,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update travel_user_t
travel_num = #{travelNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_num = #{userNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_go = #{gmtGo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_back = #{gmtBack,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
trasportation_back = #{trasportationBack,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trasportation_go = #{trasportationGo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cost_go = #{costGo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cost_back = #{costBack,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cos_stay = #{cosStay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
booking_type_back = #{bookingTypeBack,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
booking_type_go = #{bookingTypeGo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stay_booking_type = #{stayBookingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stay_days = #{stayDays,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update travel_user_t set travel_num = #{travelNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_num = #{userNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_go = #{gmtGo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_back = #{gmtBack,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, trasportation_back = #{trasportationBack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trasportation_go = #{trasportationGo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost_go = #{costGo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cost_back = #{costBack,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cos_stay = #{cosStay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, booking_type_back = #{bookingTypeBack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, booking_type_go = #{bookingTypeGo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stay_booking_type = #{stayBookingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stay_days = #{stayDays,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from travel_user_t a,travel_info_t b where a.travel_num=b.travel_num
and CONCAT(YEAR(gmt_back),'年',MONTH(gmt_back),'月') = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT CONCAT(travel_info_t.origin,'-',travel_info_t.destination,'-',travel_info_t.origin) AS trip, travel_info_t.cause AS cause, travel_user_t.user_name AS user_name, DATE_FORMAT(travel_user_t.gmt_go,'%Y/%m/%d') AS gmt_go, DATE_FORMAT(travel_user_t.gmt_go,'%H:%i') AS go_time_point, DATE_FORMAT(travel_user_t.gmt_back,'%Y/%m/%d') AS gmt_back, DATE_FORMAT(travel_user_t.gmt_back,'%H:%i') AS back_time_point, travel_user_t.trasportation_back AS trasportation_back, travel_user_t.trasportation_go AS trasportation_go, travel_user_t.cost_go AS cost_go, travel_user_t.cost_back AS cost_back, travel_user_t.cos_stay AS cos_stay, travel_user_t.booking_type_back AS booking_type_back, travel_user_t.booking_type_go AS booking_type_go, travel_user_t.stay_booking_type AS stay_booking_type, city_cost_standard_t.standard AS stay_one_day, user_t.user_level AS user_level, user_t.department as department, travel_user_t.stay_days as stay_days FROM travel_user_t INNER JOIN travel_info_t ON travel_info_t.travel_num = travel_user_t.travel_num INNER JOIN city_cost_standard_t ON city_cost_standard_t.city_name = travel_info_t.destination INNER JOIN user_t ON travel_user_t.user_num = user_t.user_num and CONCAT(YEAR(gmt_back),'年',IF(MONTH(gmt_back) < 10,CONCAT('0',MONTH(gmt_back)),MONTH(gmt_back)),'月') = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
